author: cgsavard
body:
#### PR description:

This PR changes the jet selection that goes into tracker HT. These cuts were studied as part of a larger L1 track jet study and were found to outperform the current HT jet selection cuts (seen in slide 7 [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1340389/contributions/5642800/attachments/2741793/4769440/GTT_trkjet_27_10_23.pdf)).

#### PR validation:

I have run all the code checks necessary and this has already been accepted by L1T in the PR [here](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1173). I was asked to make the same pull request into CMSSW.
title: Change tracker HT jet selection in GTT
